summary: This is a business record certification from Municipal Credit Union responding to a subpoena for financial records related to case reference SUB9316-DJ. The certification states that checks and credit card statements were not applicable to produce, and that Suspicious Activity Reports or Currency Transaction Reports would be handled separately by the BSA Department.

persons.name: Danielle Jones
persons.context: Authorized custodian of records at Municipal Credit Union who certifies the accuracy and completeness of documents produced in response to a subpoena.

persons.name: Patricia Gonzalez
persons.context: Notary Public who notarized the business record certification document.

events.title: Business Record Certification for Subpoena Response
events.description: Municipal Credit Union provides certification of records in response to subpoena reference SUB9316-DJ, indicating checks and credit card statements were not applicable.

keyFacts: Municipal Credit Union responded to subpoena reference SUB9316-DJ with a business record certification.
The certification states that checks and credit card statements were 'Not Applicable' to produce.
Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) and Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs) were not included and would be handled separately by the BSA Department.
The document was notarized by Patricia Gonzalez, a Notary Public qualified in Queens County.
The case reference SUB9316-DJ suggests this is part of an investigation requiring financial records.
